text: Almost unbearable smell. Don't get close!
Stink Baaaad!
Hitting that skin with a sword is like hitting a mountain with a toothpick! No wonder these trolls are so much more confident than their brethren.
Stone Skin
Stench of Death
This creature reeks of death, rotten corpses, feces and worse. Being near it is almost intolerable.
Devour them all!
Hunger can be a greater motivation than any other. The Monsterhorde will storm towards the enemy, and nothing can stop it!
Throgg can give limited orders to the trolls that are the longest under his influence. This order makes them swing low and wide, effective against smaller targets.
Throgg's Order: Squish the Little Ones!
Throgg's Order: Defend yourselves!
Throgg can give limited orders to the trolls that are the longest under his influence. This order makes them fight more cautiously and protect their vital organs.
Throgg can give limited orders to the trolls that are the longest under his influence. This order makes them chase tirelessly after faster targets.
Throgg's Order: Get the Fast Ones!
Throgg can give limited orders to the trolls that are the longest under his influence. This order makes them hit harder and aim higher to hit the weak points of bigger enemies.
Throgg's Order: Aim Higher!
Natural Carmouflage

These Trolls are carmouflaged in forests by their natural coloration. However, they are too stupid to understand the concept of an ambush. Their smell and the noise they make will give their position away once someone is close enough.
Weakened Regeneration
The regenerative ability of Bile Trolls is mostly occupied by keeping their many afflictions at bay. This means that wounds Bile Trolls receive are healing much slower compared to other Trolls.
Host to Terrifying Afflictions
Bile Trolls are feared by all, even by their famously stupid kin. They aren't feared for their combat prowess though, instead no one wants to get near them and risk infection - not even their allies.
Reckless Rampage
This is what happens if an already angry Troll feels provoked, frustrated, threatened or bored.
Night Trolls are known to make noises sounding like mocking laughter while tearing their enemies apart. Those who witness these sounds can be easily intimidated by them.
Mocking Laughter
Lava Trolls are filled with unbearable heat. Those getting too close are affected by this heat, their flesh burning in the presence of this twisted troll species.
Burning Presence

The twisted effects of their warpstone changed skin made the skin of these creatures highly resistant to any damage, especially magic. They don't feel pain and will not run before the their unnatural armour is broken.
Warpstone Skin
Old Boss dead, me now bestest, most integli...inelli... me strongest, me boss now!
Me Boss Now!
I have seen worse, but i still don't recommend to get anywhere near it - Unknown Empire Soldier
Corrosive Vomit
You run, me hurt you good! Fight! Fight!
Violent Command
The strongest River Troll has the most repulsive, damaging vomit. Who would have thought?
Greater Swamp Breath

Chief Ugma's oversized hammer has probably been taken from the statue of a Dwarf hero or ancestor god in the fallen Karak Azgal. Chief Umga doesn't seem to care though, all that matters is that the hammer has the right size and doesn't break.
Karak Azgal Stone Hammer
Ugma improvised his armour himself. It is made from the equipment of foes he bested. Some of the items have magical effects which additionally benefit him.
Ugma's Trash Armour
